data.title: Bernice Louise Hayes Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Bernice Louise Hayes, age 62, passed away suddenly at her home in Albuquerque on Friday, May 5, 2023. She was the cherished daughter of Dr. Fredrick and Jean Hayes; loving mothe...
data.text:
Bernice Louise Hayes, age 62, passed away suddenly at her home in Albuquerque on Friday, May 5, 2023. She was the cherished daughter of Dr. Fredrick and Jean Hayes; loving mother of Ryan Toovey. She is also survived by Ryan's wife, Jackie and son, David; sister, Adrienne Archibeque and daughter Khadijah Judd; brother, Stacey Hayes and wife, Mary.

Besides her beauty and loving personality, she was dedicated to helping others through her career field of psychology, having received a Masters Degree from U.N.M. She was employed as a counselor at Blue Cross Blue Shield.

Family and friends may bid farewell at 11:00 a.m. on Friday, May 19, 2023, at FRENCH- Lomas with Burial following at Sunset Memorial Park.
